items.text: picks out deep square. Bangladesh are buzzing. Rohit Sharma has handed his wicket off a short ball. Short ball at the hips, goes aerial with the pull. There's at least 30 yards between deep square and fine leg but he doesn't find that gap. Nazmul runs to his right and takes a good catch. Game. On.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Sharma, OUT

dismissal.text: RG Sharma c Nazmul Islam b Rubel Hossain 48 (55b 3x4 3x6) SR: 87.27

items.text: short and very wide. He lets it go
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: short of a length ball in at leg stump. Raps Dhoni on the back foot as he looks to flick. The lbw appeal is turned down
items.postText: lameson: "Let's go, 1 more wicket BD, and you're in with a shot. Would've been so much better had BD even had at least 10-15 runs more to play with. Ahh, if only, if only."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: yorker on leg stump, jammed out to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: overpitched just outside off, driven firmly to mid-off
items.postText: Shanay: "Rubel Hossain to Rohit Sharma today- 21 balls, 2 singles, 1leg-bye, 1 six off a top edge and finally the wicket"
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.preText: Sanjay : "It is only fair to say that openers had done enough and it is time for DK and MS and rest to step up, like any middle order batsman needs to do in a top team. This match is not going to be one sided, which is good for cricket. Last over finish?"
items.text: full on middle stump, driven to mid-on's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: short and wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on off stump, stabs at it from the crease and gets a thick outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length ball just outside off, tapped into the covers off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched to extra cover's left
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: nicely timed. Short ball outside off, a controlled pull into the turf and out to deep square
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, turned to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: bouncer dug in too short. Flies over Dhoni's head
items.postText: Akshaykumar Sir: "This the the perfect platform for MS Dhoni. Low run rate requirement. Not many batsmen to go. Sub-continent conditions. It all boils down to handling pressure. Can he bring out his A game? The entire nation is hoping he does."
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, 1 wide

items.text: length ball dipping in fiercely at middle stump. Tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: another bouncer. Dhoni steps into the off side and allows this to fly past his front shoulder
items.postText: AG: "@Sanjay - Au contraire mon ami,I would say that openers have not helped the actual cause of finding suitable middle order players in this tournament. Unless they get to play 10-12 consecutive matches and get opportunity to bat longer, I aint gonna find what they are looking for. "
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended into the covers off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended to point off the front foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length on off stump, defended off the front foot
items.postText: Awais: "Mashrafe should gove spinners 2-3 overs here. Dhoni has been struggling against spin recently."
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: length and into the pads. Allows it to come and flicks to fine leg's left
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: length on off stump, walks down at it and punches to mid-off
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: short of a length ball wide outside off, spanks it straight to the fielder on the up
items.postText: The tension's building. Sreshth will surf it for a bit.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on middle stump. Dhoni walks down the wicket and effictively yorks himself. Bunts it towards mid on
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full just outside off. Turning away after pitching, and Dhoni pushes at this with the angled bat to backward point
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, no run

items.text: good length outside off stump. Dhoni moves towards the leg side, and then cuts this square to the sweeper fielder
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, 1 run
